mutants.code:
def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] - q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] * q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples - r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples * r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=False)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=False)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=False)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X + Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X - Y])
    return max_sum

def max_deliciousness_sum(X, Y, A, B, C, p, q, r):
    p.sort(reverse=True)
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    selected_apples = p[:X] + q[:Y]
    all_apples = selected_apples + r
    all_apples.sort(reverse=True)
    max_sum = sum(all_apples[:X * Y])
    return max_sum
